episodes.synopsis: Pastor Steven reflects on human history and helps us acknowledge our struggle for identity and embrace our true selves.
episodes.title: Just Call Me Jacob

episodes.synopsis: Pastor Steven teaches us how to embrace our birthright as believers in Christ, avoid compromising our future and recover it when we go astray.
episodes.title: Starving Sons (Beware of the Bowl)

episodes.synopsis: Pastor Steven brings attention to our dissatisfaction with the here and now and teaches us how to experience God's presence at all times.
episodes.title: When God Shows Up in the Middle of Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: Pastor Steven helps us find purpose in our frustration when God's plan takes us down a life path that doesn't match our expectations.
episodes.title: Sister Wives (Unexpected Blessings)

episodes.synopsis: In this segment, Pastor Steven teaches us to recognize God's purpose in all of life's circumstances and how to consider all situations a blessing.
episodes.title: Naming Rights (Call It What You Want)

video.title: #DeathToSelfie with Steven Furtick
video.synopsis: Sermons offers Christian solutions for finding peace in a world where people compare their unfiltered lives to others edited to appear perfect.
